policies.description: Placeholder rule for EDD on high-risk countries customers.

policies.description: Placeholder rule for basic CDD requirements.

policies.name: Minimum age check
policies.description: Placeholder rule to ensure customers meet minimum age requirements.

policies.name: PEP screening required
policies.description: Placeholder rule to screen politically exposed persons.

policies.name: Sanctions list screening
policies.description: Placeholder rule to screen customers against sanctions lists.

policies.name: Transaction monitoring thresholds
policies.description: Placeholder rule to monitor transactions based on thresholds.

policies.name: Ads — no minors targeting
policies.description: Prevent ads from being targeted at minors

policies.name: AML SAR Reporting (UK)
policies.description: Suspicious activity reports must be filed to UK authorities when suspicious activity is detected.

policies.name: AU IGA No Prohibited Services
policies.description: Do not offer prohibited interactive gambling services to Australian players under the IGA.

policies.name: Deposit Limit Controls
policies.description: Players can set and enforce deposit limits; exceeded limits require enforced blocks until reset.

policies.name: In-Play Delay Controls
policies.description: Minimum delay for live betting acceptance

policies.name: License Check — AU Northern Territory
policies.description: Operator licensed by NT Racing Commission

policies.name: License Check — CO Division
policies.description: Operator licensed by CO Division of Gaming

policies.name: Self-exclusion (ROFUS - Denmark)
policies.description: Enforce self-exclusion checks against the national ROFUS registry

policies.name: Slots Minimum Spin Speed (UK)
policies.description: Enforces a minimum 2.5 second spin speed for UK slot games to reduce rapid play risk.

policies.name: Slots No Autoplay (UK)
policies.description: Autoplay functionality is prohibited for UK slot games per UKGC guidance.

policies.name: COPPA Deletion on Parent Request
policies.description: Child personal data must be deleted when a verifiable parent deletion request is received.

policies.name: AML Account Freeze On Sanctions Hit
AML Adverse Media Screening
policies.description: Adverse media checks on onboarding and ongoing

policies.name: Blockchain Analytics Risk Controls
policies.description: Use risk signals from chain analytics

policies.name: Chargeback Monitoring
policies.description: Monitor and react to chargeback rates

policies.name: PCI DSS — PAN Masking in Logs
PSD2 SCA (Strong Customer Authentication)
policies.description: Placeholder rule to ensure SCA for EU customers.

policies.name: RBI eKYC — High-risk controls
policies.description: Enforces enhanced due diligence and monitoring steps for high‑risk customers under RBI eKYC guidelines.

policies.name: US Money Transmitter Licensing (MTL)
policies.description: Validates required state money transmitter licenses are held and current for covered US jurisdictions.

policies.name: Consent required
policies.description: Placeholder rule to ensure lawfulness of processing based on consent or other legal basis.

policies.name: Data minimization
policies.description: Placeholder rule to ensure only necessary data is collected and processed.

policies.name: Storage limitation (data retention)
policies.description: Placeholder rule to ensure personal data is not kept longer than necessary.

policies.name: Disallow hostNetwork in Pods
policies.description: Forbid use of hostNetwork to reduce host exposure.

policies.name: Disallow image tag latest
policies.description: Prevent use of the 'latest' image tag.

policies.name: Limit container capabilities
policies.description: Limit allowed Linux capabilities for containers.

policies.name: Disallow running as root
policies.description: Require containers to run as non-root users.

policies.name: Require imagePullPolicy: Always
policies.description: Ensure imagePullPolicy is Always to avoid stale images.

policies.name: Require resource requests/limits
policies.description: Ensure containers define resource requests and limits.

policies.name: Ca QC Law25 Privacy Governance
policies.description: Assign privacy officer; implement governance policies (P-39.1 as amended)

policies.name: CPRA: Sensitive Data Limited Use
policies.description: Limit use of sensitive personal information

policies.name: GDPR: Consent Valid
policies.description: Consent is informed, freely given, unambiguous, recorded

policies.name: GDPR: Dpia Required High Risk
policies.description: DPIA required completed for high-risk processing (Art. 35)

policies.name: GDPR: DSAR Timeline 30D
policies.description: Respond to DSAR within one month

policies.name: GDPR: Lawful Basis Required
policies.description: Lawful basis documented for each processing activity

policies.name: GDPR: Retention Limit
policies.description: Retention periods not to exceed policy

policies.name: GDPR: Transfer Scc
policies.description: SCCs or equivalent safeguards for cross-border transfers

policies.name: KR: Pipa Breach Notification
policies.description: Notify data subjects/authority upon breach per PIPA

policies.name: Legal Hold No Delete Enforced
policies.description: Block deletions during active legal hold

policies.name: MX: LFPDPPP Notice At Collection
policies.description: Provide privacy notice at/ before collection

policies.name: NZ: Breach Notification
policies.description: Notify OPC affected individuals of notifiable privacy breach

policies.name: SA: PDPL Breach Notify
policies.description: Notify authority data subjects per PDPL timelines

policies.name: Th PDPA Breach Notify
policies.description: Notify authority affected individuals under PDPA

policies.name: TR: KVKK VERBIS Registration
policies.description: Register as data controller in VERBIS when applicable

policies.name: Vn Pdpd Notice And Consent
policies.description: Provide notice obtain consent per PDPD

policies.name: EBS volume encryption enabled
policies.description: Placeholder rule for ensuring encryption at rest for block storage volumes.

policies.name: Enforce HTTPS only
policies.description: Placeholder rule to enforce HTTPS/TLS for data in transit.

policies.name: Strong password policy
policies.description: Placeholder rule to enforce strong IAM password policy settings.

policies.name: Logging enabled
policies.description: Placeholder rule to ensure logging and monitoring are enabled.

policies.name: Encrypt stored cardholder data
policies.description: Placeholder rule for ensuring storage encryption for cardholder data.

policies.name: AU — Audit trails & secure hosting controls
policies.description: Requires immutable audit logging and secure regulated hosting to support oversight and integrity in AU operations.

policies.name: Responsible Gambling — Self-exclusion enforced
policies.description: Ensures platform enforces active self-exclusion states so excluded players cannot access gambling services.

policies.name: UIGEA — Payment blocks
policies.description: Blocks prohibited gambling payment transactions in line with UIGEA restrictions on unlawful internet wagering.
